title: Steelers with Trubisky, Josh Allen MVP hopes, NFL Draft favorites, Matt Corral, and Niners future
itunes:title: Steelers with Trubisky, Josh Allen MVP hopes, NFL Draft favorites, Matt Corral, and Niners future
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with hosts Jane Slater, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Emmanuel Sanders discussing the future of the Steelers now moving on from Ben Roethlisberger.  The crew dissects the chances that Josh Allen will be the MVP frontrunner this season.  With the NFL Draft around the corner, who are the players we should be paying attention to?  One of them will be QB prospect, Matt Corral, who joins us to talk about his jump from Ole Miss to the NFL.  We wrap up with Emmanuel's thoughts on the 49ers upcoming decision on Jimmy Garoppolo.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with hosts Jane Slater, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Emmanuel Sanders discussing the future of the Steelers now moving on from Ben Roethlisberger.  The crew dissects the chances that Josh Allen will be the MVP frontrunner this season.  With the NFL Draft around the corner, who are the players we should be paying attention to?  One of them will be QB prospect, Matt Corral, who joins us to talk about his jump from Ole Miss to the NFL.  We wrap up with Emmanuel's thoughts on the 49ers upcoming decision on Jimmy Garoppolo.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Sports, NFL, Football, NFL Draft, Pittsburgh Steelers, Emmanuel Sanders, Buffalo Bills, Josh Allen, San Francisco 49ers, Trey Lance, Mitch Trubisky, Ben Roethlisberger, MVP, Ole Miss, Matt Corral, Jimmy Garoppolo
